alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 4:35PM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and flash freeze on area roads. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys, worst conditions expected Missoula to Florence. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
